title: Ticket #7539: Ignore FlockLevel from remote negotiator in schedd
description: When flocking to multiple pools, and especially with FLOCK_INCREMENT > 1, the schedd incorrectly lowers the per-submitter flock level from time to time. That bug will be fixed in a separate ticket. As a result of that bug, a flocking negotiator will frequently contact a schedd and ask for job requests for a submitter, and the schedd will send no jobs, because it thinks it shouldn't be flocking there. Let's remove this check. If an (older) submitter ad exists in the remote collector, we should just honor it, and send jobs there.
remarks:
